summary: A young boy, in an effort to have a normal childhood in 1980's El Salvador, is caught up in a dramatic fight for his life as he desperately tries to avoid the war which is raging all around him.
cast: Carlos Padilla|Leonor Varela|Gustavo Muñoz|José María Yazpik|Ofelia Medina|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Jesús Ochoa|Jorge Angel Toriello|Adrian Alonso|Andrés Márquez|Alejandro Felipe|Ana Paulina Caceres|Xuna Primus|Paulina Gaitan|Alan Chávez|Gustavo Sánchez Parra|Héctor Jiménez|Guillermo Ríos|Lourdes Villareal|Ania Yarasech|Prisiliana Hernández|Aurelio Perea Morales|Luisa Garza|Alberto Lara|Filomena Hernández|Lucila Casterejón|Jonathan Morales|Daniela Varela|René Hernandez|Jennifer Cuevas|Gilda Navarro|Margarita Mandoki|José Augustín Flores|Manuel Zorrilla|Antonio García|Juan Carlos Luna|Félix Johannes|Isabel Galvan|Juan Aquino Navarro|Luis Gonzaga Padilla|Leon Rafael|Penny Redman|María Antonia Ruíz|Nayeli Tlapa|Claudia Suárez|Rafael Moya|José Gabriel Marín|Analí Bravo|Karla María González|Esther Galván|Edgar Mencos|Amelia Contreras|María De Los Ángeles Osuna|Enrique Suárez|Javier Mercado|Ernesto Mejia|Enrique Carrillo|Javier Pedraza|Víctor González|Pablo Cuevas|Ignacio Retes
title: Voces inocentes
